title.value: Влияние элементов технологии на содержание вредных несахаров у гибридов сахарной свеклы
Effect of technology elements on the content of damaging of non-sugars in hybrids of sugar beet

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Lukanyuk, N.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming.  Experimental Scientific Station on Sugar Beet

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the influence of the individual elements of the technology of sugar beet (Beta vulgaris var. saccharifera) root crop processing quality in hybrids with different degrees of resistance to complex pathogens. The field experiment was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2008 in the experimental field of JSC 'Gorodeya Sugar Factory', in 2010-2011 on the experimental field of Experimental Scientific Station on Sugar Beet on sod-podzolic sandy loam soil. As a result of realized research it was revealed that the additional nitrogen fertilization was inadvisable. On high cultivated sod-podzolic soil the application of micronutrients Polycom 'Beet' + Polibor in pure form for the technological qualities of roots had no effect. In a complex application with fungicides showed improvement of technological qualities of roots. The use of fungicides in cercosporosis (Cercospora blight) epiphytoty years and also at it moderate development was justified on hybrids with different degrees of resistance. The influence of intensification factors on technological qualities of sugar beet (average for 2008, 2010-2011); technological qualities of sugar beet hybrids on the various nitrogen nutrition levels were presented.
